Text: Thanks for uploading Y&R.  You do a great job.  I notice that the Friday 12-24 show is going to be a repeat from 2008.  Do you plan on uploading it?  Again thanks.

Hi Claudia,

It's Christmas morning in Australia and the sun is shining. I wish you a very Merry Christmas and a great New Year.
Thank you for being you. 

Cheers
Mickey :):):)
